ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the Annotations API with Polar Chart
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Generates polar charts with all supported annotation types.
[b][i]Note![/i][/b] Polar Chart currently does not support HorizontalLineAnnotation and VerticalLineAnnotation.
[b]Documentation Links[/b]
- [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Polar%20charts%20Type.html']Polar Chart Types[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Axes.PolarXAxis.html']Polar XAxis[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Axes.PolarYAxis.html']Polar YAxis[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/Intro%20to%20the%20Annotations%20API.html']Annotations API Documentation[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/MVVM%20Annotations%20API.html']Databinding Annotations with MVVM[/url]
